record.title: ORDER FOR RECESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, before I yield the floor, on behalf of the majority leader I ask unanimous consent the Senate stand in recess from 2:30 to 3:45 today.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I yield the floor.

record.chair: The Senator from Idaho is recognized.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak as in morning business for up to 15 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
